task.summary:
feat(guards): add GreaterThan comparison guards and improve null/empty visitor
- Add Is.GreaterThan<TLeft,TRight> method with null guards and callback support - Add Is.GreaterThanOrEqual<TLeft,TRight> method with null guards and callback support - Remove basic NullVisitor implementation - Replace with comprehensive NullOrEmptyVisitor supporting nested member access chains - Add type-specific empty checks for string, arrays, collections, dictionaries, and numeric types - Implement null-safe member chain traversal to prevent NullReferenceException on nested properties
Breaking changes: - NullVisitor class removed (internal API)
New APIs: - Is.GreaterThan<TLeft,TRight>(TLeft, TRight, SGuardCallback?) -> bool - Is.GreaterThanOrEqual<TLeft,TRight>(TLeft, TRight, SGuardCallback?) -> bool

docs(README): improve formatting and consistency
- Standardize arrow symbols `→` and fix minor grammatical inconsistencies. - Enhance readability by improving list formatting and outcome descriptions. - Adjust semantics for clarity around key concepts like `NullOrEmpty`.

docs(README): enhance icon styling with centered image and dimensions
- Replaced Markdown image syntax with HTML for precise styling. - Added alignment and defined custom width and height for the icon.

feat(guards): add string-based comparison guards and enhance exception messaging
- Add GreaterThan, GreaterThanOrEqual, LessThan, LessThanOrEqual, and Between string comparison guards with StringComparison support. - Introduce string-aware ThrowIf.Between methods, including overloads for custom exceptions. - Improve exception messages for comparison guards by swapping parameter order in error details. - Adjust project metadata for version increment (2.0.1) including FileVersion and PackageVersion updates.

chore(project): update to version 2.0.2 and update license to GPL-3.0-or-later
- Bump PackageVersion, AssemblyVersion, and FileVersion to 2.0.2. - Change project license from AGPL-3.0-only to GPL-3.0-or-later. - Update release notes to reflect licensing update and compliance requirements.

chore(project): update to version 2.0.3
- Removed `PackAsTool`. - Bump PackageVersion and AssemblyVersion to 2.0.3. - Update release notes to reflect version increment.

- Added `LessThan` and `LessThanOrEqual` guards for generics and strings. - Added `Any<T>` and `All<T>` guards with predicate support. - String guards now support `StringComparison` for culture-aware checks. - Unified callback support across all guards. - Custom exception overloads and constructor argument support. - Generic exception creation with `ExceptionActivator.Create<T>`, supporting both parameterless and parameterized constructors. - Expression caching for improved performance in null/empty checks. - Improved documentation and XML comments.

chore(project): add GitHub workflows, templates, and change license to MIT
- Introduce CI workflow with build, test, and coverage setup. - Add pull request and feature request templates to `.github` directory for better contribution guidelines. - Change license from GNU GPL-3.0 to MIT for simplified compliance and broader usage. - Update solution file to include new test project structure.

feat(guards): add comparison guards, custom exceptions, and enhance tests
- Introduced new guards: `Is.All`, `Is.Any`, `Is.Between`, `Is.GreaterThan`, and `Is.GreaterThanOrEqual` with overloads for generics and strings. - Added custom exceptions (`AllException`, `AnyException`, `BetweenException`, `GreaterThanException`, `GreaterThanOrEqualException`) to improve error handling. - Implemented `ExceptionActivator` for dynamic creation of exceptions. - Extended unit tests for new guards and exception handling.

refactor(guards): remove comparison guards and custom exceptions
- Removed `Is.All`, `Is.Any`, `Is.Between`, `Is.GreaterThan`, `Is.GreaterThanOrEqual`, and related string-based guards. - Deleted custom exceptions (`AllException`, `AnyException`, `BetweenException`, `GreaterThanException`, `GreaterThanOrEqualException`) and `ExceptionActivator`. - Cleaned up tests and XML documentation for removed components.
chore: add CODEOWNERS file to define default reviewers and ownership rules

chore(ci): enhance workflows and simplify project structure
- Updated GitHub workflows (`ci.yml` and `publish.yml`) to include caching for NuGet packages, multi-TargetFramework support (.NET 6-9), and TRX test result artifacts. - Refined solution file to include GitHub-specific directories and metadata files. - Improved CONTRIBUTING.md with correct repository URLs. - Adjusted file structure and updated `.csproj` to remove unused metadata and references.

chore: restructure project, add coverage workflow, and update metadata
- Introduced `.github/workflows/coverage-readme.yml` for automated coverage updates. - Reorganized test files and renamed for clarity (e.g., `ThrowIfAllTests.cs` → `CallbacksTests.cs`). - Updated `.sln` and `.csproj` to include new metadata and remove redundant entries. - Refreshed `README.md` with badges, versioning details, and usage examples. - Reset package version to `0.1.0` and added additional files (e.g., `icon.png`, `LICENSE`) to NuGet package bundle.

Update project files and documentation for benchmark discoverability.
- Removed unnecessary benchmark artifact file references in `SGuard.Benchmark.csproj`. - Updated `SGuard.csproj` to version 0.1.2 with detailed release notes emphasizing benchmark accessibility. - Enhanced `README.md` and `Changelog.md` to provide a clearer path to benchmark results.

MESSAGE.value: "Remove unused exception classes and redundant utility methods"
Removed unused classes and methods `AllNullException`, `CallbackOption`, `Is`, and `Is.Throw`.
Add guard evaluation methods and exceptions for comparison checks

feat(guards): add GreaterThan comparison guards and improve null/empty visitor
- Add Is.GreaterThan<TLeft,TRight> method with null guards and callback support - Add Is.GreaterThanOrEqual<TLeft,TRight> method with null guards and callback support - Remove basic NullVisitor implementation - Replace with comprehensive NullOrEmptyVisitor supporting nested member access chains - Add type-specific empty checks for string, arrays, collections, dictionaries, and numeric types - Implement null-safe member chain traversal to prevent NullReferenceException on nested properties
Breaking changes: - NullVisitor class removed (internal API)
New APIs: - Is.GreaterThan<TLeft,TRight>(TLeft, TRight, SGuardCallback?) -> bool - Is.GreaterThanOrEqual<TLeft,TRight>(TLeft, TRight, SGuardCallback?) -> bool

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Update project files and documentation for benchmark discoverability.
- Removed unnecessary benchmark artifact file references in `SGuard.Benchmark.csproj`. - Updated `SGuard.csproj` to version 0.1.2 with detailed release notes emphasizing benchmark accessibility. - Enhanced `README.md` and `Changelog.md` to provide a clearer path to benchmark results.
